pageSubtitle: Manage security policies including password requirements, lockout rules, and abnormal login detection.
minCharacterTypesHelp: Ensures 'Flexible Complexity'. User must use at least N distinct character types from: Uppercase, Lowercase, Digit, Special.
historyCountHelp: Number of previous passwords to remember and prevent reuse.
expirationDaysHelp: Number of days before a password expires (0 for never).
minAgeDaysHelp: Minimum days a user must keep a password before changing it.
allowSelfPasswordChangeHelp: When enabled, users can change their own passwords from their profile page.
maxFailedAttemptsHelp: Number of failed attempts before lockout.
abnormalLoginHistoryCountHelp: Number of recent logins to analyze for abnormalities.
blockAbnormalLoginHelp: Automatically block logins detected as abnormal.
registrationEnabledHelp: When disabled, new users cannot register accounts.
maxPasskeysPerUserHelp: Maximum number of passkeys a single user can register.
requireMfaForPasskeyHelp: When enabled, users must have TOTP or Email MFA active before registering passkeys. Disabling MFA will automatically revoke all passkeys.

validation.minCharacterTypesRange: Minimum character types must be between 2 and 4
validation.passwordLengthRange: Password length must be between 6 and 128 characters
